attributes.additional_details: Many of the shows on Netflix fail to entertain all ages throughout a household. Considering people are being encouraged to stay home it would be ideal to have something that encourages people to sit together as a family and socialise
attributes.background: Full House is a family friendly show. To know it has been organised to  remove Full House from Netflix on the 31st of May 2020 disappoints many especially during a season of Covid-19 a situation in which people have to stay with their families it would be ideal to supply a reason to stay home.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for Netflix.
